title: H5P Smart Import

examples.title: No Customization
examples.description: Without customization (or using the basic Smart Import), the generative AI processes the entire content source to extract key concepts.
examples.details: This approach provides a broad overview without focusing on specific objectives or audiences.
examples.output: Broad key concepts from the entire source

examples.title: Customizing Based On User Groups
examples.description: The customization feature can tailor content for specific user groups.
examples.details: Smart Import adjusts the concepts and tone of the content to be age-appropriate and relevant.

examples.title: Customizing Focused On User Output
examples.description: Authors can decide to give more importance to specific ideas or areas of the source provided.
examples.details: Smart Import chooses and organizes important ideas focused on your specified area, streamlining the creation process.
examples.prompt: Focus on the planets and dwarf planets.
examples.output: Key concepts centered on planets and dwarf planets

examples.title: Customizing With Learning Objectives
examples.description: Smart Import enables users to align content with specific learning objectives.
examples.details: Every generated resource supports the specified learning objective, ensuring consistent focus throughout.
examples.prompt: The learner should be able to explain the main events in the formation of the solar system.
examples.output: Content focused on solar system formation stages

worksWell.title: Focused Instructions
worksWell.text: The best outcomes are obtained when prompts instruct the AI to give particular concepts or portions of the content priority.

worksWell.title: Rich, Well-Structured Inputs
worksWell.text: The quality and accuracy of generated content are improved by using comprehensive, detailed sources (such as properly formatted articles or documents).

doesntWork.title: Format-Based Instructions
doesntWork.text: Prompts like "Create a summary of less than 300 words" are redundant since Smart Import has built-in content types.

doesntWork.title: Instructions Outside Input Scope
doesntWork.text: Requests beyond the supplied source material cannot be completed. Keep prompts aligned with your content source.
